document_data.name: Wrath of the Just
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wrath of the just''''' was an [[Elven High Magic]] [[wizard]] [[spell]].
document_data.Effects: The scale of this spell meant it was only to be used if the very existence of the [[elves]] was threatened. ''Wrath of the just'' created largescale natural disasters such as floods, earthquakes, lightning storms, etc.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components to cast.
